list.name: DailyOCR
details: Ongoing project My biggest and complex project. An online platform with multiple web tools that can help users based on their needs. The project is developed on a remote Apache server using PHP for backend programming and JavaScript for frontend.

OCR: Optical Character Recognition. Based on Tesseract OCR api my OCR process is done by a C++ script that requires certain parameters in order to find the image/pdf and extract it's contents. The process implies adjusting the image to a size so the characters can be read by the API, identify it's DPI, the text recognition and extraction, text layout calculation and creating a Word or TXT file containing the text.
PDF tools: PDF conversion to image, image conversion to PDF, split PDF into multiple files etc.;
SEO tools: Keyword density checker (find the density of the most used keywords in a webpage/text input/file), sitemap checker, broken links checker etc.;
Server tools: Who is?, Domain age checker.
Blog: A blog with articles related to the subjects our platform is approaching.

list.name: Blog Template
details: Ongoing project A blog template similar to the one integrated in the project above. This project is a reflection of my web design capabilities.
No database records: articles are not stored in a database nor can be created.
Blog page/article page: the project has 2 pages, a main page and the article page.

list.name: Keyword Density Calculator
details: A PHP Class used to calculate a web page's most used keywords density
